professional_summary: AI Solutions Consultant and former Software Engineer with expertise in developing modern, inclusive design systems using React and TypeScript. Proficient in AI integration, automation workflows, accessibility improvements, state management (Redux), and API integration (REST). Currently specializing in AI automation workflows and teaching AI implementation for small businesses, with a passion for building accessible tech solutions.

responsibilities: Built custom AI automation workflows from 0 to 1 for small business clients using n8n and OpenAI.
Teaching 'AI for Small Business' workshops, gathering direct user feedback to iterate on curriculum and tools.
Developing virtual walking companion app (AvecMoi) with beta users, incorporating feedback into product decisions.
Owning entire product lifecycle: user research, MVP development, user testing, and iterative improvements.

work_experience.key_impact: Built Rules app from 0 to 1 for XDR product serving 50,000+ enterprise customers including 80% of Fortune 100 companies, processing 68 billion security queries daily across 100+ million endpoints
responsibilities: Owned full product development cycle for mission-critical security workflows used by every Trellix customer, directly impacting global enterprise cybersecurity operations.

Designed interactive rule editor UI that decreased user error rates by 20% through real-time validation and feedback mechanisms, improving security analyst productivity across Fortune 100 enterprises.
Improved design system accessibility by 60% by enforcing WCAG standards, directly impacting user adoption across the enterprise customer base of 50,000+ organizations.
Led Redux integration and mentored team members on best practices while scaling the Rules application to handle enterprise-grade data volumes.
Expanded test coverage from 55% to 95% with RTL and Jest, ensuring reliability for security-critical workflows protecting 100+ million endpoints.
Reduced bug counts by 30% via TypeScript migration; streamlined CI/CD pipelines cutting deploy time by 30% for rapid iteration on customer-facing features.
Designed and developed CRUD and MERN applications using JavaScript, React, MongoDB, and Node.js.
Improved web app performance by 15% through Chai/Mocha testing.
Implemented Git and GitHub for version control in a distributed team.
Built RESTful APIs for efficient data management and CRUD operations.
Created curriculum for remote STEM research, impacting 15,000+ locations.
Mentored 5 symposium groups on data collection for public health initiatives.
Taught young people how to use GIS and Tableau for community and public health analysis.
Led and managed an alternative school during the pandemic, designing personalized learning plans.
Fostered leadership and responsibility through service projects.
Implemented multi-level curriculum for remote learning, showcasing adaptability.
Collaborated with educators to develop innovative curricula.
Used data-driven assessments to personalize student learning plans.
Developed strong communication and presentation skills through teaching.

projects.name: AI Powered Digital Business Card
projects.description: Built web-based digital business card from 0 to 1 with integrated AI chatbot and voice features.
key_features: Natural voice synthesis with AWS Polly
User feedback integration for UX iteration
projects.impact: Demonstrates end-to-end product ownership and AI integration expertise for user-facing applications.

projects.name: Breathe App to Lessen Anxiety
projects.description: Designed and shipped PWA for guided breathing with AI voice instructions, serving users dealing with anxiety management.
projects.impact: Improved retention through user testing sessions and focus on accessibility.

projects.name: AvecMoi - Virtual Walking Companion App
projects.description: Virtual walking companion app currently in beta with active user testing and feedback incorporation.
projects.focus: User research, MVP development, iterative improvements based on beta user feedback.

projects.name: Magical Mirror App
projects.description: An app that allows users to send kind messages that appear magically when viewed by a friend.

projects.name: KDrama Movie Recommender
projects.description: A KDrama recommendation app based on user mood, built with React and OpenAI integration.

projects.name: Storybook
projects.description: This site was made using Handlebars, Materialize, Node.js, and Mongoose. It features Google authorization and uses Passport.js to handle authentication.
projects.learning: Focused on using the MVC architectural paradigm to create a clean and functioning full-stack application with Google authentication.

projects.name: Flashbacks: An App to Record Memories
projects.description: This site was made using React, Redux, and Mongoose.
projects.learning: Focused on enhancing my skills with React and Redux for state management.

projects.name: Shavon Harris Dev Website
projects.description: This site was made using React, HTML, and CSS. It's an improvement on my previous portfolio that was made with vanilla JavaScript.

projects.name: BollyBot: Random Bollywood Movie Generator
projects.description: A simple random movie generator born from my love of Bollywood movies. There are 50 Bollywood movies coming out every moment, and it takes forever to choose the right one to watch. Enter BollyBot!
projects.optimizations: I would redo the UI with React, make this a backend app, and store the data in MongoDB. Currently, the data is hardcoded.
projects.lessons_learned: This project would be more efficient with a database integration.

projects.name: Leads Tracker
projects.description: An app to track leads while applying to jobs, recruiters, and connections on LinkedIn. Built using CSS, JavaScript, and HTML with Firebase integration. Made into a Progressive Web App (PWA) so that it can be used on mobile devices.
projects.optimizations: I would work on improving the mobile interface and adding additional tracking features.

projects.name: Personal Recipe Book
projects.description: An app to store recipes I gather during my travels. Built to keep track of recipes over time.
projects.optimizations: I would add serving size and chef notes, and refactor ingredients and instructions into reusable components.
projects.lessons_learned: Acknowledgment to Brad Traversy for his courses and inspiration.

mentorship.impact: Mentored 10+ career changers transitioning into tech.
responsibilities: Provided technical guidance, code reviews, and personalized development roadmaps.
Led workshops and fostered knowledge sharing, promoting accessible technology for diverse communities.
Guided mentees on time management and conducted code reviews.
Increased mentees' LinkedIn networks to 500+ connections.
Curated and shared free learning resources like Scrimba and FreeCodeCamp.
